description:
Rito and the girls have come to the Tenjouin mansion to help as servants for the day. Momo, Yami, Nana, and Mea do their best in maid costumes, while Rito gets into "trouble" time and time again with Saki and Rin! In the middle of it all, Rin lunges at Rito wielding a strange sword: the demon sword Bladix, which possesses its human wielder and seeks blood. So Rito takes action to save Rin...
Source: crunchyroll
